tool_description: Send one time passcode for verification.
name: Simple Otp
title: Simple Otp

api_list.name: OTP
api_list.description:
Sends a request with phone number and the API will send random one time auto generated code to the phone number.

The response will let you know if the otp sending was successful or failed.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-otp.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-otp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-otp.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-otp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
